name: Companion for Star Realms
description:
Companion for Star Realms is a lightning quick way to ditch those pesky authority cards and the dice counters by providing a extremely simple method to track yours, and optionally, your opponents authority.

Easy tap interface to track your scores and reset the game. The app also features a historical record of the game for reference or tournament play.

This version features an ad-free app, but if you don't mind them, an ad-driven version is also available at no cost.
